page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE IN ARLEY
page.content: My name is Marianne Teagles. There are 7 people in my family.Mum,Dad,Sandra, Cathryn,Michael,Russell and myself. My Mum is 52 and still works at the Pit-yard, an industrial estate in New Arley, as a supervisor. My dad is 51 and he works at Daw Mill colliery. Sandra,my oldest sister,27,is married with 4 children. Cathryn,25, also is married with 4 children. Michael,23,is single and works on a farm in Sutton Coldfield. Russell,20,drives a lorry at the same factory as my mum. I am 15 and still at school. My sisters are quite close and often come to see us. All the family come to dinner on special occasions such as Christmas and christenings.
